articles.author: Karlheinz Peter, Hannah Stevens, James McFadyen
articles.title: Could blood-thinners be a lifesaver for Covid-19? Here’s what the science says - Inverse
articles.description: A spate of recent media headlines have described blood thinning medications – which include aspirin and warfarin – as a “breakthrough treatment” for COVID-19 that could “save lives”.
articles.content:
A spate of recent media headlines has described blood-thinning medications which include aspirin and warfarin as a breakthrough treatment for Covid-19 that could save lives."
